title: Hong Kong's The Upper House Implements Duetto's Revenue Strategy Solutions
text:
Duetto
Duetto brings new levels of insight and revenue optimization to one of Hong Kong's most luxurious properties
HONG KONG , Sept. 8, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- Duetto, the market leader in hotel profit optimization technology, announced that The Upper House is implementing its revenue strategy solutions, bringing new insights on pricing and demand to the landmark property. The Upper House is managed by Swire Hotels, an international management company with properties in Asia , Europe and North America .
Designed by architect Andre Fu , The Upper House is a distinctive modern luxury property that sits atop Hong Kong's bustling urban landscape. Duetto provides the only pricing solution able to handle today's complexity of different customer segments, room categories, length of stay restrictions and distribution channels. The company's approach, combining Open Pricing and Big Data analysis, has enabled Duetto customers to far outpace their competitive sets, often seeing twice the rate of revenue growth over their competitors.
Marcel Thoma , General Manager of The Upper House, said, "In a competitive and rapidly changing marketplace, it's imperative that we are able to price across today's complex distribution landscape and respond quickly to changing market dynamics. Duetto provides the latest technology to incorporate complex data sets and demand insights into our pricing decisions. We are also excited to apply Open Pricing to yield by room type to maximize our hotel's revenue. We look forward to a long and productive partnership."
Opened in October 2009 and sister to Beijing's The Opposite House, The Upper House occupies the top floors of Pacific Place. Its look and feel is decidedly modern and understated, with creamy, neutral tones, sleek, modernist furnishings and sizable studios filled with the latest high tech amenities. Famed chef Gray Kunz's Cafe Gray Deluxe serves updated classics, while the bar and lounge and many of its rooms deliver incredible views.
"We are happy to announce this partnership with The Upper House, as Duetto's Revenue Strategy Solutions continue to gain traction at many of the region's most distinctive hotel properties," said Patrick Bosworth , Duetto CEO and co-founder. "The hotel community in Hong Kong and similar markets have a critical need to find solutions that allow for flexibility to fully optimize revenue and keep pace with the evolving distribution landscape, and we are proud to join with The Upper House, and Swire Hotels, to make those capabilities available."
Thanks to rapid marketplace adoption, Duetto is expanding in key markets throughout the Americas, Europe and Asia . Nearly 1,000 hotels and casinos in more than 50 countries have partnered to use Duetto's revenue strategy solutions.

About Duetto
Duetto delivers the most powerful revenue strategy solutions to the world's leading hotels and casinos, allowing them to better manage pricing, revenue and business-mix decisions with superior, actionable data.
The unique combination of hospitality experience and technology leadership enables Duetto to provide new insights on pricing and demand as a true cloud-based software-as-a-service. With solutions that address the challenges of today's distribution landscape, Duetto's applications are a GameChanger - optimizing profit and guest loyalty.
Thanks to rapid marketplace adoption, Duetto is expanding in key markets throughout the Americas, Europe and Asia . Nearly 1,000 hotels and casinos in more than 50 countries have partnered to use Duetto's revenue strategy solutions.
About Swire Hotels and Swire Restaurants
Swire Hotels has been created to manage soulfully individual hotels in Hong Kong , Mainland China, the United Kingdom and the USA , providing a characterful experience for well travelled individually minded travellers who seek originality, style and personalized service. We create distinctive hotels with a sense of place that break with convention.
The company's first hotel, The Opposite House in Beijing , opened in 2008 and was followed by The Upper House, Hong Kong , and then by EAST, Hong Kong and EAST, Beijing . The Temple House in Chengdu is opened in July 2015 and EAST, Miami in Q4 2015.
Swire Hotels has also created a stylish collection of locally inspired hotels in the UK: the first Chapter Hotel, The Montpellier Chapter, opened in Cheltenham in 2010 and was followed by The Magdalen Chapter in Exeter .
A restaurant division was set up in 2013 to manage the company's stand-alone restaurant operations. Our first restaurant Plat du Jour opened in November 2013 followed by Public and Ground Public in Quarry Bay and The Continental in Pacific Place which opened in October 2014 . Mr. & Mrs Fox, the latest dining concept in Taikoo Place, is due to open in September 2015 .
